properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 8:15AM PST until February 14 at 8:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
6 to 11 feet at 19 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 8 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM PST FRIDAY
